parts.title: Part 1 - For Loops
parts.description: In this video you will learn about looping based on sequences using For loops and range() function.

question1.text: What does a for loop repeat over?

question2.text: Which of these does NOT represent sequences in Python?

question3.text: What is the last value in the sequence returned by range(15)?

parts.title: Part 2 - For Loops with Strings
parts.description: In this video you will practice creating for loops with different range() sequences and learn about using for loops with strings as sequences.

question1.text: What does a for loop do when used with a string?

options.text: Loops through each character in the string
Converts the string to a number

question2.text:
What will this expression return in Python?
"a" in "cat"

question3.text: What does the len() function return when used on a string?

options.text: The number of characters in the string

parts.title: Part 3 - Modules
parts.description: In this video you will learn about python modules, how to use them in code and about the random module.

question1.text: Which statement is FALSE about modules?

options.text: Modules contain functions written by other people
You can access a module function directly without importing the module
import is a reserved word used for modules

question2.text: What is the correct way to call a function from a module?

options.text: A sequence of numbers between the range starting from 5 and up to but not including 10
A random number between the range starting from 5 and up to but not including 10
A random number between the range starting from 5 and up to & including 10
